original_text: And the land of Judah shall be a terror unto Egypt, every one that maketh mention thereof shall be afraid in himself, because of the counsel of the Lord of hosts, which he hath determined against it.
korean_text: 유다의 땅은 애굽의 두려움이 되리니 이는 만군의 여호와께서 애굽에 대하여 정하신 계획으로 말미암음이라 그 소문을 듣는 자마다 떨리라

sentences.original_text: And the land of Judah shall be a terror unto Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 땅은 이집트에게 공포가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: every one that maketh mention thereof
because of counsel of the Lord of hosts
which he hath determined against it
